import React from 'react'; import { FiLock } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { IoClose } from 'react-icons/io5'; function BookMovie({ setpayment, Cinema, ShowData, ShowTime, price }) { const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API + 'booked', { method: 'POST', headers: { Accept: 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ Cinema: Cinema, ShowData: ShowData, ShowTime: ShowTime, UserName: localStorage.getItem('userName:'), UserEmail: localStorage.getItem('userEmail:'), }), }) .then(res => res.json()) .then( result => { console.log(result); alert('Your movie has been booked Successfully!'); }, error => { console.log(error); alert('Something went wrong'); } ); }; return (
setpayment(false)} className='flex justify-end h-12 ' >

Secure payment info

); } export default BookMovie;
